Anyway, here’s the full list of games being added to PS Plus and its various tiers next week:

PlayStation Plus Extra And Premium

Soul Hackers 2 | PS5



PS5 Sand Land | PS4, PS5

PS4, PS5 Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted – Full Time Edition | PS4, PS5



PS4, PS5 Battlefield V | PS4



| PS4 S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Advertisement

Remember, to access, download, and play these games you’ll need to be an active PS Plus Extra or Premium tier subscriber. I’ve got new PS Plus games to download and play, like Sand Land, Battlefield V, and a whole trilogy of classic STALKER games.
